submodules.title: Task Management UI
submodules.description: A clean and intuitive interface that allows users to easily add, complete, and delete tasks. The UI will feature a prominent input field for new tasks and a list view for existing tasks, ensuring a seamless user experience.

submodules.title: Task Checkbox Functionality
submodules.description: Each task will have an associated checkbox that users can click to mark tasks as done. This feature provides immediate visual feedback, enhancing user engagement and satisfaction.

submodules.title: Responsive Design
submodules.description: The application will be designed to work flawlessly across various devices and screen sizes, ensuring that users can manage their tasks on desktops, tablets, and smartphones without any loss of functionality.

submodules.title: Light/Dark Theme Toggle
submodules.description: An optional feature that allows users to switch between light and dark themes, catering to personal preferences and improving usability in different lighting conditions.

submodules.title: LocalStorage Management
submodules.description: Implementation of localStorage to save tasks persistently on the user's device. This ensures that tasks remain available even after the browser is closed, providing a reliable and efficient way to manage user data.

submodules.title: Filter Functionality
submodules.description: An optional feature that allows users to filter tasks based on their status: all, active, or completed. This helps users focus on specific tasks and enhances the overall task management experience.

submodules.title: Minimal UI Design
submodules.description: The application will feature a minimalistic design approach, reducing clutter and distractions. This will help users concentrate on their tasks and improve overall productivity.

submodules.title: User Feedback Mechanism
submodules.description: Incorporating subtle animations and notifications to provide users with feedback on their actions, such as task completion or deletion, enhancing the interactive experience.

submodules.title: Unit Testing
submodules.description: Conducting unit tests for all functionalities to ensure that each component of the application works as intended, thereby minimizing bugs and improving reliability.

submodules.title: User Acceptance Testing
submodules.description: Gathering feedback from real users to validate the application's usability and functionality, ensuring that it meets user expectations and requirements before launch.
